[h1] Portal, la reina de todos los puzzles, expande su territorio. [/h1]

Portal 2 es uno de los juegos más completos que puedan existir. Ofrece una historia interesante, narrada adecuadamente, con sus matices, y que amplía el universo de Aperture Science, compartido por otro famoso juego de la empresa. A su vez presenta puzzles bastante complejos, un diseño de niveles inmejorables, una ambientación exquisita y una musicalización muy competente y de estilo definido. 

En duración es lo justo, ni muy largo ni muy corto. La dificultad está bien repartida a lo largo del juego, al igual que los diferentes momentos trascendentes de la historia. Agrega a la maravillosa mecánica de portales muchísimos elementos que la enriquecerían aún más. Los geles azules, blancos, naranjas, las plataformas de luz, los lásers, los trampolines, los rayos de gravedad, etc. Se hace difícil pedirle que agregue más cosas. 

El apartado artístico es algo que no se puede no mencionar. Se trata de cómo el poder del tiempo arrasó con las ambiciosas instalaciones. Como la vegetación ahora estaba surgiendo. Todo está en ruinas, sucio, destruido. Una increíble industria que lo único que queda es aquello automatizado. Ahora se cuentan leyendas, de lo acontecido en el primer Portal. Conoceremos en esta nueva aventura de Chell, a la vieja Aperture Science, a su creador, sus orígenes, sus planes, e incluso quién es GLaDOS. La iluminación mejora notablemente, haciendo muestra de las capacidades del nuevo Source. El doblaje (por lo menos en inglés) es fantástico, dándoles un toque de carisma único a todos sus personajes.

Pero aún hay más, Portal 2 ofrece un modo multijugador, integrado al universo y la coherencia del juego y con unos niveles muy bien pensados para resolver en pareja.

[b] Definitivamente su precio vale por el juego. [/b] Son muchas las cosas que este juego ofrece: Puzzles, plataformas, acción, una historia interesante, multijugador, mecánicas originales, y una experiencia por lo menos para mí muy valiosa.
By god, this game is such an amazing improvement over the likes of the first Portal game. This is definitely one of the BEST games Valve has created ever! I would recommend it to anyone and everyone.

This game was absolutely amazing, story wise, game play wise, everything. It made me think outside of the box, be accompanied with comedic relief, and ended in a way not many other games could pull off.

It's already pretty well known Portal and Portal 2 has a lot more than what meets the eye, but to find out what, I recommend you play the game.

Portal 2 is a game with a gripping and intense storyline where you must solve puzzles inside a facility known as Aperture Laboratories. During this game puzzles become more difficult as you play and more tools to solve them are added such as various gels, cubes and more. There are four robots you encounter during the story, the first being Wheatley, a core who makes the biggest twist in the whole story happen, the second being GlaDOS, a giant robot who learns many lessons about friendship during the adventure and then two robots who are the opposite of each other, one is small, round and blue (Atlas) whilst the other is tall, thin and orange (P-Body) however these two have a very short appearance in the singleplayer part of the game. There is a multiplayer section on Portal 2 where one of you must be Atlas (person who is hosting) and the other must be P-Body (guest in the game) and you solve puzzles together whilst listening to commentary from GlaDOS. If you are a fan of puzzles and science or even just good storylines then I can guarantee that you will enjoy playing Portal 2.

Great to play as a co-op. Problem solving at the highest level. Good on your lazy synapses...

Not to be played while drunk.
GREAT GAME ! CHILLOUT ! ♚♚♚

Portal is fun, this is better. Besides it being longer and with better graphics this game has your old friend insulting your weight and how your parents abandoned you (something she didn't do, only implied that you will be missed) all while solving puzzles while your new core friend tries to help you escape. Exploring the outside of the test chambers is pretty cool as well. Going to the workshop and seeing what other players have created adds more to your playing experience. Also, if you want even more, there's a whole multiplayer game where you and a friend can solve puzzles together or just find ways to make them fall to their deaths and laugh about it.  If you want a cool game where you solve puzzles in a broken down facility with a computer's jokes and the silly turrets, this game is for you. The only reason you wouldn't like it is if you have no sense of humor

#PORTAL3

Portal 2 игра от Valve вышла в 2011 г. и является лучшей головоломкой и по сей день. Если вам этого не достаточно что бы  ринутся покупать игру я расскажу чем же она так хороша.
Сюжет у игры может слегка простоват, но всё же интересен сюжетных повротов не много, но они впечетляют. Персонажи прописаны они здорово и запоминаются. А шутки здесь просто отличные.
Геймплей стал несколько лучше чем в предыдущей части появились 3 вида жидкостей энегетический луч и воронка. Сингл впечатляет вот мы в тестовых камерах потом вот за их пределами и везде нам понадобится портальное устройство. Также здесь есть кооп почти такой же крутой как и сингл. Рассказывать о геймплее можно долго, но лучше поиграть и всё ощутить самостоятельно.
Графика весьма симпотична локации и декорации радуют глаз. А атмосфера просто шикарна.
Звуковое сопровождение ласкает ваши уши.
К тому же в игре нет значительных минусов. Рекомендую обсолютно всем. Отличная игра.

Portal ist einfach bombig *-* Wer den ersten Teil mochte, wird auch mit diesem seinen spaß haben :))

Das Spiel bietet im Einzelspielermodus eine gute und lustige Story, aber am allerbesten finde Ich den mehr als gelungenen Coop Modus! =)

Auch dieser ist witzig, bietet knifflige Rätsel und das aller beste wenn man von den vorhandenen Kammern nicht genug bekommt, kann man sich mit seinem Coop Partner an von Spielern erstellten Testkammern wagen^^

Ich selbst habe noch keine eigenen Kammern erstellt, habe aber von Freunden erfahren das der Editor wenn man sich bisschen damit beschäftigt hat, super leicht zu bedienen ist.

Habe den Coop Modus schon mit 4 Freunden durchgespielt und immer noch eine Menge spaß dran :)
Also wer Portal 2 noch nicht hat sollte es sich aufjedenfall kaufen!

Seguindo a genialidade do primeiro jogo, Portal 2 se sobressai a seu antecessor com muito mais conteúdo e puzzles tão bons quanto, ou melhores.
Narrativa muito marcante, muito bem humorada que INFELIZMENTE não possuí tradução, logo você acaba precisando ter um certo conhecimento de inglês para entender (eu infelizmente não entendi muitas piadas, mas sabia que eram piadas).
O que mais marca Portal 2 com toda a certeza é seu modo coop: Você pode sacanear seu colega de jogatina, e ele pode se vingar também. O jogo possuí chat por voz e escrito, o que ajuda muito para fazer os puzzles do jogo quando jogando coperativo.
E não bastasse ser mais longo e com mais conteúdo que seu antecessor, ele ainda possuí Workshop na steam, aumentando ainda mais o tanto de conteúdo que o jogo possuí.
Não é necessário, mas recomendo jogar o primeiro jogo antes desse.
Se Pokémon é must-have (precisa ter) para o seu DS/3DS, algum jogo de Mario ou The Legend of Zelda para os consoles da Nintendo, Uncharted, Killzone para consoles da Sony e Gears of War para o Xbox, com toda a certeza do mundo, Portal 1 e 2 é must-have para PC.

A perfect sequel to the original Portal, with a brilliant mix of an engaging story and entertaining puzzles. 

If you're on the fence about picking this up, you definitely won't be disappointed.

A game that has secured it's place as a must have game for PC. With all the fan-made test chambers now available through the Steam Workshop, gives you plenty of reasons to pick the game back up after completing the standard Single Player and Co-op storylines. 

An excellent game, brilliant story, and some very clever puzzles that make you think outside the edgeless puzzle cube.

This game is very cool and you should get it if you dont already have it becuase you can play singleplayer campaign you can play co-op campaign single player maps co-op maps make your own maps... i highly reccomend this game
1a Sci-fi story

Portal 2 is a truely unique puzzle action game which makes great use of a portal gun that can form two seperate portals which would allow the player to traverse the levels.

A great sequel to the original Portal game, Portal 2 is a much longer game which features much more complex puzzles and introduces lovable new characters. The voice acting and dialogue in this game is amazingly entertaining and funny, I found myself chuckling multiple time during the game due to the character dialogues! The level design in this game is also great as there were some levels which left me stumped for quite awhile and it took me quite alot of brain power to solve them and that gave me a great feeling after doing so!

This game features a co-operative mode which allows players to play with people in your friend list or complete strangers through match-making. There are some form of customization options such as hats in the co-operative mode that can be unlocked through completing the game. There was supposed to be more customization options available in a shop but it has since been discontinued. Trading is also unavailable which is pretty unfortunate as it would be great for players to exchange or sell cosmetics.

There is also a level creation tool in this game which allow players to create their own Portal 2 levels and share it online with others by uploading it to the workshop! Several interesting extra content includes a portal 2 comic which serves as a prequel to the game and a super 8 (a pretty old movie by now) interactive game demo.

Overall, Portal 2 is a very entertaining game with great puzzles, characters and voice acting. I would give it a 9/10! A must buy if you enjoy action puzzle games!
